name: react-redux-universal
description: Example of the universal app on react, redux, koa, etc.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf public/client && rm -f public/public
scripts.compile: export DEBUG=app:* PROJECT_PATH= NODE_ENV=production && npm run clean && npm run _compile:client && npm run _compile:server
scripts.lint: eslint src/**/*.js src/*.js server/*.js server/**/*.js config/*.js config/**/*.js build/*.js build/**/*.js
scripts.dev: export DEBUG=app:* PROJECT_PATH= NODE_HOST=localhost NODE_PORT=4000 && npm run clean && npm run _create:link && npm run _compile:client && npm run _compile:server && concurrent --kill-others "npm run _compile:client:watch" "npm run _compile:server:watch" "npm run _start:server"
scripts.watch: export DEBUG=app:* PROJECT_PATH= NODE_HOST=localhost NODE_PORT=4000 && npm run clean && npm run _compile:client -- --hmr && npm run _compile:server -- --hmr && concurrent --kill-others "npm run _compile:server:watch -- --hmr" "npm run _start:dev-server -- --hmr" "npm run _start:server -- --hmr"
scripts.watch:logger: export DEBUG=app:* PROJECT_PATH= NODE_HOST=localhost NODE_PORT=4000 && npm run clean && npm run _compile:client -- --hmr --no_debug --redux_logger && npm run _compile:server -- --hmr --no_debug --redux_logger && concurrent --kill-others "npm run _compile:server:watch -- --hmr --no_debug --redux_logger" "npm run _start:dev-server -- --hmr --no_debug --redux_logger" "npm run _start:server -- --hmr --no_debug --redux_logger"

author: Aleksandr Efremov <eav@bystrobank.ru>
